EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing AeroVue Rebate Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully registered for the $25,000 AeroVue rebate.
Keep this email as your record of registration for claiming the rebate.
Thank you!
BendixKing sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com]]>
